standup.title: Role Play - give your update in a team mate's voice
standup.summary: Each team mate get to wear the shoes of the other team mate and give their update like how the team mate would do it
standup.description: The team rolls a dice to determine who starts. This person (starter) would do their standup by making an impression of team member A, then after ask member A to do their update in the starter's voice. Member A points the next team member and the cycle goes on. This is fun and encourages camaraderie between team mates.
benefits: Gives opportunity for team members to try to see things from the perspective of other team mates
Great way to practice and understand the different communication styles within the team
